mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn,a.room_code,b.room_typename,b.room_typeprice,b.room_deposit,a.room_typeid from tb_room a join tb_roomtype b on a.room_typeid=b.room_typeid where rownum < #{end}) a where a.rn > #{start}
mapper.update: update tb_room set ROOM_TYPEID=#{ROOM_TYPEID} where room_code = #{ROOM_CODE}
